Smadav Pro 2020 Rev. 13.5.0 is a powerful antivirus software that provides extra protection for your computer and USB drive. It can detect and remove various types of viruses, malware, spyware, ransomware, and other threats. It can also work as a secondary antivirus program that complements your main antivirus solution.

In this article, we will show you how to download and install Smadav Pro 2020 Rev. 13.5.0 with Key on your Windows PC. You will also learn about the features and benefits of Smadav Pro 2020 Rev. 13.5.0 and how to use it effectively.
 
## What is Smadav Pro 2020 Rev. 13.5.0?
 
Smadav Pro 2020 Rev. 13.5.0 is the latest version of Smadav Pro, a popular antivirus software developed by Zainuddin Nafarin, an Indonesian programmer. Smadav Pro 2020 Rev. 13.5.0 was released on December 27, 2021, and it has several improvements and new features compared to the previous versions.
 
Some of the features and benefits of Smadav Pro 2020 Rev. 13.5.0 are:
 
- It can scan and clean your computer and USB drive from various viruses, malware, spyware, ransomware, and other threats.
- It can work as a secondary antivirus program that complements your main antivirus solution.
- It can perform automatic updates with an internet connection whenever there is a new revision.
- It can speed up the scanning process by filtering by file type.
- It can change the color theme according to your preference.
- It can create an exception list for files, folders, or registries that you consider safe and should be ignored.
- It can protect your computer from registry attacks, which can be used by some viruses to infect your system.
- It can provide you with a registration name and key that you can use to activate the pro version for free.

## How to Download Smadav Pro 2020 Rev. 13.5.0 with Key?
 
To download Smadav Pro 2020 Rev. 13.5.0 with Key, you need to follow these steps:

1. Go to the official website of Smadav at [https://www.smadav.net/](https://www.smadav.net/).
2. Click on the "Download" button at the top right corner of the homepage.
3. Select the "Smadav Pro" option from the drop-down menu.
4. You will be redirected to a page where you can choose your payment method and enter your email address.
5. After you complete the payment process, you will receive an email with a download link and a registration name and key.
6. Click on the download link and save the file to your computer.

## How to Install Smadav Pro 2020 Rev. 13.5.0 with Key?
 
To install Smadav Pro 2020 Rev. 13.5.0 with Key, you need to follow these steps:

1. Locate the downloaded file on your computer and double-click on it to run the installer.
2. Select your preferred language and click on "OK".
3. Accept the license agreement and click on "Next".
4. Choose your destination folder and click on "Next".
5. Select your additional tasks and click on "Next".
6. Click on "Install" to start the installation process.
7. Wait for the installation process to finish and click on "Finish".
8. Launch Smadav Pro 2020 Rev. 13.5.0 from your desktop or start menu.
